steps.title: Online Nonimmigrant Visa Application (DS-160)
descriptions: Access the DS-160 online application form.
Fill out the form accurately, providing all required information. Be prepared to upload a recent passport-sized photo.

steps.title: Create a Profile on the U.S. Visa Information and Appointment Services Website
descriptions: Go to the U.S. Visa Information and Appointment Services website.
Create a profile and enter the DS-160 confirmation number.

steps.title: Pay the Visa Application Fee
descriptions: Pay the non-refundable visa application fee through the designated payment system.
Save the payment receipt as you will need it for scheduling your visa interview.

steps.title: Schedule An Interview
descriptions: Use your profile on the U.S. Visa Information and Appointment Services website to schedule a visa interview at the nearest U.S. Embassy or Consulate.
Pay any additional processing fees if required.

steps.title: Attend the Visa Interview
descriptions: Prepare all necessary documents, including your DS-160 confirmation page, passport, photo, and supporting documents based on your visa type.
Attend the visa interview at the scheduled time and location.
Answer questions honestly and provide any requested information.

steps.title: Collect Your Visa And Get Ready To Travel
descriptions: After the interview and fingerprinting (if applicable), your visa application will undergo processing.
This can take several weeks, so be patient.
Once you have your visa, you can plan your trip to the United States.
Enjoy your trip to the U.S.!
